name: Portfolio Performance Analysis
description: Test portfolio performance calculation and analysis workflow

input.request: Analyze the performance of account TEST001 for the last quarter. Provide performance metrics, risk assessment, and compare against benchmarks.

name: Portfolio Rebalancing Recommendation
description: Test portfolio rebalancing workflow with risk tolerance considerations

input.request: Review account DEMO001 for rebalancing opportunities. The client has moderate risk tolerance and wants to maintain 60/40 equity/bond allocation.

name: Multi-Account Portfolio Summary
description: Test consolidated portfolio view across multiple accounts

input.request: Provide a consolidated portfolio summary for client with accounts CLIENT001, CLIENT002, and CLIENT003. Include asset allocation, performance, and risk metrics.

name: Cross-Client Market Impact Analysis
description: Test analysis of market impact across all managed clients

input.request: Analyze how recent market volatility has impacted all my clients over the past month. Identify clients most affected and those with opportunities.

name: Client Enhancement Opportunities
description: Test identification of portfolio enhancement opportunities across clients

input.request: Identify enhancement opportunities across all my clients with minimum $100,000 AUM. Focus on tax optimization, risk reduction, and yield enhancement.

name: Client Outreach Recommendations
description: Test generation of personalized client outreach recommendations

input.request: Generate personalized outreach recommendations for all clients based on recent market events, portfolio performance, and client interaction history.

name: Risk Tolerance Assessment
description: Test risk tolerance assessment and portfolio alignment

input.request: Assess risk tolerance for account WM100001 and evaluate if current portfolio alignment is appropriate. Provide recommendations if needed.
Conduct comprehensive risk analysis for account WM100005 including VaR, stress testing, and scenario analysis.
Evaluate fiduciary compliance for all advisory relationships. Check for conflicts of interest, fee transparency, and suitability.
Generate quarterly regulatory reports including Form ADV updates, client activity summaries, and compliance metrics.

name: Market Volatility Analysis
description: Test market volatility analysis and client impact assessment

input.request: Analyze current market volatility levels and assess potential impact on client portfolios. Provide defensive recommendations.

name: Market Commentary Generation
description: Test generation of market commentary and client communication

input.request: Generate weekly market commentary focusing on Fed policy, earnings season, and sector rotation. Include client-specific implications.
